name: Intuitive Digital
description:
Intuitive Digital is a data-driven digital marketing agency in Portland, Oregon specializing in SEO, PPC, Web Design and Development, Content and CRO. 
We try to Cultivate Happiness for our clients (we call them partners) by delivering quality work to help them grow their business. And for our employees by creating a healthy work-life balance in a supportive company culture that encourages growth and experimentation.
We do this by obsessively following our 4 core values:
Doing what’s right
Creating fun
Continuous improvement
Building long-term relationships 
We specialize in working with small-mid size businesses, e-commerce, nonprofits, and higher education institutions. 
No two marketing plans or strategies look the same at Intuitive. We learn about our partners' specific business needs, challenges, and customers. 
We create customized marketing plans for each partner, endlessly striving to improve your ROI to get the most value out of your marketing budget. 
For that, you need a great end-to-end user experience, from the moment a potential customer types in a search until the moment they decide to work with you. You need to reach people with the right message at every stage in their decision process.
At Intuitive Digital, that’s what we do best.
